data.eml:eml: New species and records of scale mites (Acari: Pterygosomatidae) from Arabian agamid lizards (Squamata: Agamidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Fajfer, Monika, Melnikov, Daniel (2014): New species and records of scale mites (Acari: Pterygosomatidae) from Arabian agamid lizards (Squamata: Agamidae). Zootaxa 3764 (4): 401-417, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3764.4.1
